galaxies.name: Xylen Verge
galaxies.description: Mysterious and highly isolated galaxy known for its ancient starfields and unpredictable magnetic anomalies. Traders here are resilient and resourceful.

galaxies.name: Cindros Bloom
galaxies.description: First utopian galaxy still shining bright to this very moment. A symbol of peace, balance, and successful interstellar diplomacy.

galaxies.name: Vrellian Sprawl
galaxies.description: A sprawling galactic web filled with hybrid civilizations, political intrigue, and shifting alliances. Traders thrive in the chaos here.

galaxies.name: Oon Cascade
galaxies.description: This vibrant galaxy is known for its waterfall-like nebulae and harmonic energy fields. A hub for cultural exchange and moderate trade activity.

galaxies.name: Galactic Rift
galaxies.description: A dense, gravity-torn stretch of space filled with mineral wealth and ancient relics. Despite its instability, it's a popular location for resource mining.

galaxies.name: Marrowth Deltas
galaxies.description: Turbulent galaxy fractured by black hole tributaries and violent plasma storms. Trade is lucrative but extremely high-risk.

galaxies.name: Cryofern Wastes
galaxies.description: Frozen galaxy teeming with abandoned outposts and dormant alien technologies. Dangerous terrain for travelers, but full of opportunity.

galaxies.name: Henus Vault
galaxies.description: Dangerous area full of life lurking in the shadows. Total anarchy. Extreme market volatility. Rumors of hidden vaults and clandestine experiments fuel constant interest.

galaxies.name: Krothu-9
galaxies.description: A quiet mid-range galaxy known for its stable solar systems and rare crystal formations. Often used as a relay point by long-haul traders.

galaxies.name: Driftspire Helix
galaxies.description: Now peaceful area under no direct control or authority which was recently devastated by the great cybernetic wars. A few civilizations remain mostly trading goods as a means of survival with nearby commercial haulers. Once the core of technological advancement, now a humbled neutral zone.

galaxies.name: Terra Nexus
galaxies.description: Oldest paradise themed galaxy in the entire universe. Once revered as a model of harmony, recent instability has brought dangerous tides and fluctuating alliances.

galaxies.name: Sostilisor
galaxies.description: Unstable and enigmatic, this galaxy houses ancient ruins and unexplored anomalies. Navigation is difficult and local space-time fields are erratic.

galaxies.name: Astral Plateaus
galaxies.description: Conflict zone where multiple factions are fighting over their pure hatred for one another. An endless demand of resources makes for a popular and dangerous market. Expect extreme volatility. Battles erupt without warning across the plateaus of starlight and smoke.

galaxies.name: Nexva Dawless
galaxies.description: Remote and lawless, this galaxy exists at the edge of known space. Filled with rogue fleets, experimental tech, and cosmic storms.

galaxies.name: Quantum Flux
galaxies.description: Ever-shifting and impossible to predict, Quantum Flux is a galaxy defined by its unstable spacetime fabric. Transit corridors blink in and out of existence without notice.
